Item.Line: Welcome, traveler. How may I help you?
I would like some apple cider please.
You got it.
.......Wow, is this place usually this crowded?
Yes, and it is all thanks to Frederic.
Who is Frederic?
You will see. Here he comes!
(A timid looking person holding a violin enters the bar. The crowd immediately quieted down.)
Is he Frederic?
sshhhh!

(Without warning, the person started to play a nocturne. He does not play loudly, but he clearly captures everyone in the audience with his music. His voilin sings with the sweetest voice in the world.)
Wow, is he a professional?
I'd say he is even better than the professionals out there. But let me tell you a secret... Violin is not his main instrument.
Then what is?
Piano. But he plays the violin here because there ain't no piano in this bar.
Okay... I have to go talk to him.
(Frederic finishes playing, and sits down at a corner. He starts to drink a cup of apple cider nonchalantly. You decided to approach him.)
Hey... your playing was great! And I don't say this to just anyone... My mother was a professional violinist, so I know it when I hear a good musician play.
Thanks. Your mother "was" a professional violinist?
She... was dead 10 years ago.
I am sorry to hear that.
My dad was also a musician too. And he left this baton for me.
!!This baton belongs to a legendary conductor. And you are his son?
Yes.
Interesting. So tell me, what brings you here?
I want to become a conductor as well. I heard there is a conservatory in this city, so I thought I might recruit some players for my ensemble here.
Indeed, and I happen to be one of the instructors of that conservatory.
Cool!
I have an idea. If you can impress me with your conducting, not only I will join your ensemble, but I will also urge my students to join.
Okay!
